column2: We have temporarily prolonged the time we have, but the orbital strike is surely still coming!
I cannot get command on the chatter, even from this position!
Maybe we should push through after all - the sooner we're through, the better!
We are in the eye, but the storm's nerves connect ever deeper.
Maybe we can take a small breather here?
Staying or pressing forth... neither an ideal choice.
We'll need our strength for what's to come.
